title: Yellowshield 240 Litre Wheelie Bin - GREY/BLACK (Standard Household Size) - EN 840 standard, Most Popular Bin

Wheelie bin Grey Wheelie bin Black wheelie bin 240 Litre Grey wheelie bin
description: Product Description 240 Litre Wheelie Bin Grey/Black Standard Household Size Manufactured to EN 840 and RAL-GZ 951/1 standards The 240 Litre Dark Grey Wheelie Bin is the ubiquitous wheelie bin adopted by most councils for collecting domestic waste across the breadth and depth of the UK. Constructed from high density polyethylene, the bin is lightweight and robust, being able to withstand tough external conditions and regular use. The practical and convenient design of the 240 Litre Wheelie Bin enables ease of handling and complete manoeuvrability even when fully loaded thanks to the fitted durable rubber wheels. Free Delivery (Approx. 3 working days) Manufactured to EN 840 and RAL-GZ 951/1 standards Stores up-to 4 refuse sacks Ideal for domestic waste refuse collection The standard size used by many councils Constructed from high density polyethyleneResistant to UV rays and harsh external conditions Lightweight yet robust construction Simple to clean and hygienic Close fitting lid prevents spillage Available with a large range of accessories. (Fitted Locks, Paper Slots and Bottle Bank Lids) **If you have any doubts over which wheelie bin size and/ or colour your council will empty, then please contact your local authority as each one may adopt different policies. Features & Benefits Free Delivery (Approx. 3 working days) Tough and Durable Most Popular Bin Manufactured to EN 840 and RAL-GZ 951/1 standards Resistant to UV rays and harsh external conditions
